app_desc.message: Finds all sorts of images and videos located under the cursor.

shortcut.message: Try invoking Images Under Cursor with ‘$1’ for more accuracy!

empty.message: 🤔 No image or video found at this location, sorry!

req_perm_text.message: Thanks for installing Images Under Cursor. To use this extension on any page, Firefox needs an extra permission. Please click the button below then click “Allow” when prompted by Firefox.

req_perm_denied.message: You denied the request. Images Under Cursor doesn't work well without this permission. You can try again by clicking the button.
